body:
hi

Is there any experience out there to share regarding installing
Daysim (Linux version) on a Mac PPC running OS 10.4 ?

Questions:
- Can it be done i.e will a Linux app run on OS 10.4 ?
- If yes to above, which directory is best to install Daysim in (/usr/
local/bin?)?
- How great is Daysim ?

tom
subject: [Radiance-general] daysim on osx
